# Install libraries
```{r}

# Directly from R
install.packages("ggpubr")
install.packages('corrplot')
install.packages("RColorBrewer")
install.packages("tidyverse")
install.packages("ggrepel")
install.packages("ggstatsplot")

# From Bioconductor
if (!require("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")

BiocManager::install("MAGeCKFlute")


```

# Load libraries
```{r Libraries, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

library(ggpubr)
library(corrplot)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(tidyverse)
library(MAGeCKFlute)
library(ggrepel)
library(ggstatsplot)

```

# Load MAGeCK data
```{r}

# Load count summary and normalized count data
count_summary <- read.delim("FASTQ/A549.countsummary.txt", header = T)
raw_count_data <- read.delim("FASTQ/A549.count.txt", header = T) 
norm_count_data <- read.delim("FASTQ/A549.count_normalized.txt", header = T) 

```

# Initial QC
```{r}

# Add Condition column
count_summary$Condition <- c(
  rep("FST", 4),  # FST1, FST2, FST3, FST4
  rep("MT0", 2),  # MT0R1, MT0R2
  rep("MT1", 2),  # MT1R1, MT1R2
  rep("MT2", 2),  # MT2R1, MT2R2
  rep("MT5", 2),  # MT5R1, MT5R2
  rep("ST2", 2),  # ST2R1, ST2R2
  rep("BST", 2),  # BST2R1, BST2R2
  rep("NST", 2),  # NST2R1, NST2R2
  "Plasmid"       # Plasmid
)

# Define color scheme
color_scheme <- c(
  "MT0" = "#1f5f61", # Pre Dox 2D // Tumor // Control
  "MT1" = "#5c85a3", # Dox // 2D // 1 passages // Tumor
  "MT2" = "#a17373", # Dox // 2D // 2 passages // Tumor
  "MT5" = "#3e4772", # Dox // 2D // 5 passages // Tumor
  "ST2" = "#c47a53", # Dox // 3D // Spheroid // RPMI (Cancer cell medium) // Cluster
  "BST" = "#72536a", # Dox // 3D // Spheroid // NB (Neuron cell medium) // Tumor
  "NST" = "#8f4731", # Dox // 3D // Spheroid // Tumor + Neurons // Cluster
  "Plasmid" = "#b2a8b8"  # Adding a color for Plasmid
)

# Define the desired order of labels
ordered_labels <- c("Plasmid", 
                   "MT0R1", "MT0R2",
                   "MT1R1", "MT1R2", 
                   "MT2R1", "MT2R2",
                   "MT5R1", "MT5R2", 
                   "ST2R1", "ST2R2",
                   "BST2R1", "BST2R2", 
                   "NST2R1", "NST2R2")

# Gini Index
p1 <- count_summary %>%
  # Filter to only include rows with Labels in the ordered_labels vector
  filter(Label %in% ordered_labels) %>%
  # Convert Label to factor with specific order
  mutate(Label = factor(Label, levels = ordered_labels)) %>%
  ggbarplot(
    x = "Label", y = "GiniIndex",
    fill = "Condition", lab.pos = "out", xlab = "Sample",
    position = position_dodge(),
    ggtheme = theme_pubclean(base_size = 18),
    palette = color_scheme
  ) +
  theme(legend.position = "right", 
        axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90))

# Save the plot
ggsave(plot = p1, "SAM.vitro.gini.pdf", width = 10, height = 6, units = "in", dpi = 300)


# Missed sgRNA

# Define color scheme
color_scheme <- c(
  "MT0" = "#1f5f61", # Pre Dox 2D // Tumor // Control
  "MT1" = "#5c85a3", # Dox // 2D // 1 passages // Tumor
  "MT2" = "#a17373", # Dox // 2D // 2 passages // Tumor
  "MT5" = "#3e4772", # Dox // 2D // 5 passages // Tumor
  "ST2" = "#c47a53", # Dox // 3D // Spheroid // RPMI (Cancer cell medium) // Cluster
  "BST" = "#72536a", # Dox // 3D // Spheroid // NB (Neuron cell medium) // Tumor
  "NST" = "#8f4731", # Dox // 3D // Spheroid // Tumor + Neurons // Cluster
  "Plasmid" = "#b2a8b8"  # Adding a color for Plasmid
)

# Define the sample order
sample_order <- c("Plasmid", "MT0R1", "MT0R2",
                 "MT1R1", "MT1R2", "MT2R1", "MT2R2",
                 "MT5R1", "MT5R2", "ST2R1", "ST2R2",
                 "BST2R1", "BST2R2", "NST2R1", "NST2R2")

# Filter the data to include only the samples we want
count_summary_filtered <- count_summary %>%
  filter(Label %in% sample_order) %>%
  mutate(Label = factor(Label, levels = sample_order))

# Calculate missed sgrnas
count_summary_filtered$Missed <- log10(count_summary_filtered$Zerocounts)

# Create the plot
missed_plot <- ggbarplot(count_summary_filtered,
          x = "Label", 
          y = "Zerocounts",
          fill = "Condition", 
          lab.pos = "out", 
          xlab = "Sample",
          position = position_dodge(),
          ggtheme = theme_pubclean(base_size = 18),
          palette = color_scheme) +  # Add the color palette
  theme(legend.position = "right", 
        axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90))

# Save the plot
ggsave("SAM.missgrna.pdf", 
       plot = missed_plot,
       width = 10, 
       height = 6, 
       units = "in", 
       dpi = 300)


# Define the sample order
sample_order <- c("Plasmid", "MT0R1", "MT0R2",
                 "MT1R1", "MT1R2", "MT2R1", "MT2R2",
                 "MT5R1", "MT5R2", "ST2R1", "ST2R2",
                 "BST2R1", "BST2R2", "NST2R1", "NST2R2")

# Calculate mapped and unmapped reads with percentages
plot_data <- count_summary_filtered %>%
  mutate(
    Mapped = round(Reads * Percentage),
    Unmapped = Reads - Mapped,
    Mapped_Percentage = round(Percentage * 100),
    Unmapped_Percentage = round((1 - Percentage) * 100)
  ) %>%
  select(Label, Mapped, Unmapped, Mapped_Percentage, Unmapped_Percentage) %>%
  tidyr::pivot_longer(cols = c(Mapped, Unmapped), names_to = "category", values_to = "count") %>%
  mutate(
    Label = factor(Label, levels = sample_order),
    category = factor(category, levels = c("Unmapped", "Mapped")),
    percentage = ifelse(category == "Mapped", Mapped_Percentage, Unmapped_Percentage)
  )

# Map ratio plot
p2 <- ggbarplot(plot_data, x = "Label", y = "count",
          fill = "category", color = "category",
          palette = c("#813e3e", "#005073"),  # Using colors from your scheme
          position = position_stack(),
          xlab = "", ylab = "Reads") +
  geom_text(aes(label = sprintf("%d%%", percentage), group = category), 
            position = position_stack(vjust = 0.5), color = "white", size = 3.5) + # Increased from 2.5 to 4
  theme_pubclean(base_size = 18) +
  scale_y_continuous(
    breaks = seq(0, 8e6, by = 2e6),
    labels = function(x) paste0(x/1e6, "M"),
    limits = c(0, 8e6)) + 
  theme(legend.position = "right", 
        axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90))

# Save the plot
ggsave(plot = p2, "SAM.map.pdf", width = 11, height = 7, units = "in", dpi = 300)

```

# Define colors and order for the samples
```{r}

# Add a column with the Day information
count_summary$Day <- c(rep("D0", 2),  # D0R1 - D0R2
                       rep("D21", 7)) # IVR1 - IVR2, XENOR1 - XENOR2 - XENOR3 - XENOR4 - XENOR5

# Add a column with the Type of culture information
count_summary$Type <- c(rep("In Vitro", 4),  # D0R1 - D0R2,  IVR1 - IVR2
                        rep("In Vivo", 5)) # XENOR1 - XENOR2 - XENOR3 - XENOR4 - XENOR5

# Define color scheme
Colors <- c( "D0R1" = "#9f9f9f", "D0R2" = "#424242",
             "IVR1" = "#5f638f","IVR2" = "#36234e",
             "XENOR1" = "#a3d8ff", "XENOR2" = "#80cfff", 
             "XENOR3" = "#4a7ebb", "XENOR4" = "#1f4c7a", "XENOR5" = "#0f2e4d")

# Define the desired order of labels
Order <- c("D0R1", "D0R2", 
           "IVR1", "IVR2", 
           "XENOR1", "XENOR2", 
           "XENOR3", "XENOR4", "XENOR5")

```

# Gini index
```{r}

count_summary %>%
  # Filter to only include rows with Labels in the Order vector
  filter(Label %in% Order) %>%
  # Convert Label to factor with specific order
  mutate(Label = factor(Label, levels = Order)) %>%
  ggbarplot( x = "Label", y = "GiniIndex",
             fill = "Label", lab.pos = "out", xlab = "Sample",
             ggtheme = theme_pubclean(base_size = 18),
             palette = Colors) +
  theme(legend.position = "right")

# Save the plot
ggsave("MAGeCK-Gini-Index.pdf", 
       width = 12, 
       height = 6, 
       units = "in",
       dpi = 300)

```

# Ratio of mapped reads
```{r}

# Calculate mapped and unmapped reads with percentages
plot_data <- count_summary %>%
  mutate(Mapped = round(Reads * Percentage),
         Unmapped = Reads - Mapped,
         Mapped_Percentage = round(Percentage * 100),
         Unmapped_Percentage = round((1 - Percentage) * 100)) %>%
  select(Label, Mapped, Unmapped, Mapped_Percentage, Unmapped_Percentage) %>%
  tidyr::pivot_longer(cols = c(Mapped, Unmapped), names_to = "category", values_to = "count") %>%
  mutate(Label = factor(Label, levels = Order),
         category = factor(category, levels = c("Unmapped", "Mapped")),
         percentage = ifelse(category == "Mapped", Mapped_Percentage, Unmapped_Percentage))

# Map ratio plot
ggbarplot(plot_data, x = "Label", y = "count",
          fill = "category", color = "category",
          palette = c("#813e3e", "#005073"),
          position = position_stack(),
          xlab = "", ylab = "Reads") +
  geom_text(aes(label = sprintf("%d%%", percentage), group = category), 
            position = position_stack(vjust = 0.5), color = "white", size = 3.5) +
  theme_pubclean(base_size = 18) +
  theme(legend.position = "right")

# Save the plot
ggsave("MAGeCK-Mapped-Ratio.pdf", 
       width = 12, 
       height = 7, 
       units = "in", 
       dpi = 300)


```
